last_episode_to_air.name: Denouement
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the final episode, Aklia receives disappointing news, but reconnects with an old flame. During a photoshoot with Tammy, Jake admits his truth. Michelle secretly meets with Candice's husband George.

name: A Luv Tale
overview: A Luv Tale follows the escapades and lives of a friendship between four lesbians of color in Harlem as they navigate through life, love, and sex.

episodes.name: 3 AM
episodes.overview: On the eve of her art show, Harlem artist Taylor James shares a random night of unbridled passion with a mystery stranger that turns her world upside down.

episodes.name: Closing Night
episodes.overview: At Taylor's art show, her roommate and aspiring musician, Aklia, gets insight from rapper Swizz Beatz. Candice gets surprising news from her husband, George.

episodes.name: Sex Down
episodes.overview: Jake meets with Taylor's ex-girlfriend and model, Tammy, to learn the truth about their fractured relationship. Candice pops up on Taylor unexpectedly, which leads to a surprising discovery.

episodes.name: Expose
episodes.overview: Jake confides in a friend about his mother. At the studio, Taylor vents her concern over Jake to Aklia, while Candice and George have a heated argument over their declining marriage.

episodes.name: Queer Poetry Night
episodes.overview: Candice admits her indiscretions to her good friend, Michelle, who tries to appeal to her voice of reason. At a queer poetry night, Aklia confronts her mother about being a hypocrite.

episodes.name: Denouement
episodes.overview: In the final episode, Aklia receives disappointing news, but reconnects with an old flame. During a photoshoot with Tammy, Jake admits his truth. Michelle secretly meets with Candice's husband George.
